property.name: insertLineageTreeQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.lineage_tree ( lineage_tree_id, bio_data_item_id, nodes_path, edges_path, description ) VALUES ( :LINEAGE_TREE_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :NODES_PATH, :EDGES_PATH, :DESCRIPTION )

property.name: updateLineageTreeQuery
property.value: UPDATE catgenome.lineage_tree SET nodes_path = :NODES_PATH, edges_path = :EDGES_PATH, description = :DESCRIPTION WHERE lineage_tree_id = :LINEAGE_TREE_ID

property.name: loadLineageTreeQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
t.lineage_tree_id, t.nodes_path, t.edges_path, t.description FROM catgenome.lineage_tree t join catgenome.biological_data_item b ON t.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id WHERE lineage_tree_id = ?

property.name: loadLineageTreesQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
t.lineage_tree_id, t.nodes_path, t.edges_path, t.description FROM catgenome.lineage_tree t join catgenome.biological_data_item b ON t.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id WHERE lineage_tree_id IN (@in@)
